author: tomdz
msg: Unified proxy handling so that only those classes that actually create proxy objects have to use Proxy/VirtualProxy. All other classes now use ProxyHelper and IndirectionHandler. Also contains a first fix that only identifies those Proxy objects as ojb-proxies that have IndirectionHandler as their invocation handler.
